channel.title: The Union
channel.description:
A very well built documentary about cannabis and drug prohibition. It's a real good watch for those for and against marijuana and the laws surrounding it.
Length: 1:44:30
I skimmed through all the marijuana and drug related topics (that all eventually sway in the direction of marijuana) and felt that they, well.. Suck.
And this video is one that not a lot of people know about and it will answer lots of common questions, and those more uncommon and tell you about lots of things you probably had no clue about, including the real reason marijuana was/is illegal in the first place.
edit: I can't believe that I actually forgot the link..
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-9077214414651731007
